title: Cash's Famous Philosophy App - Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Display Cash's philosophy quotes in a browsable card-based layout
acceptanceCriteria: All quotes from the backend are displayed on screen.
Each quote is visually distinct in its own card or panel.
The layout is scrollable or paginated when there are many quotes.
The two example quotes appear in the collection.

file_operations.description: Create a QuoteCard component that displays a single philosophy quote in a card format. Style it with warm earthy tones (amber, cream, deep brown), chunky serif typography, and hand-drawn-style accents to match the irreverent diner aesthetic. Each card should be visually distinct and charming.

Create a QuotesPage that fetches all quotes from the backend using the getQuotes() method and displays them in a scrollable grid or list of QuoteCard components. Include the generated banner image frontend/public/assets/generated/philosophy-banner.dim_1200x300.png at the top of the page as a hero section. Ensure the layout is responsive and scrollable.
Wire the QuotesPage into the main App component as the default route. Remove any placeholder content and ensure QuotesPage is rendered on the root path.

requirements.summary: Apply bold, irreverent visual theme with warm tones and expressive typography
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses warm earthy tones (amber, cream, deep brown) with no blue or purple.
Typography uses a bold serif or slab font that feels expressive.
Visual style is consistent across the entire app.
The design complements the humorous, absurdist tone of the quotes.

file_operations.description: Update global styles to enforce the warm, earthy color palette (amber #D4A574, cream #F5E6D3, deep brown #3E2723). Import and apply a bold serif or slab font (e.g., Zilla Slab, Rockwell, or similar from Google Fonts). Set background to deep brown and default text to cream. Add hand-drawn-style accents using border styles or decorative elements.

Extend Tailwind theme with custom color palette (amber, cream, deepBrown) and font family for the bold serif/slab typography. Configure these as the primary theme colors to ensure consistency across all components.
